ec.char_limit_12: Limit of 12 characters / No spaces and special characters
ec.char_up_to_50: You can register up to 50 characters

ec.char_limit_30: Limit of 30 characters for Korean and English / No special characters allowed.

para.about_wallet: What is a wallet? How does it work?
para.linking_google: PFPlay allows you to become a DJ by connecting your Google account!
para.need_google_login: To use this feature, please log in with your Google account
para.logout_confirm: Do you want to log out? If yes, you will be redirected to home
para.withdraw_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Your mission points, playlists, etc. will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
para.withdraw_completed: Your account has been deleted. See you next time!
para.auth_quota_exceeded: The capacity for this permission has been exceeded
para.no_change_authority: You cannot arbitrarily change the permissions of higher-ranking users.

para.guest_limit: Access is limited as a guest. Connect your Google account to enjoy full services.

ec.integrated_body: Face selection is unavailable for full-body items

para.what_wear: What will you wear to play?

para.freely_host: Host a party with the theme that you want!

para.domain_in_use: The domain address already in use
para.name_in_use: The party name is already in use
para.cancel_confirm:
Your changes are not saved. 
Do you want to stop creating the party?
para.noti_djing_limit: DJing time limit per session is at least 3 minutes
para.noti_web_address: Please enter your party room's web address

para.auto_close_30days: If there is no DJing for 30 days, the party room will automatically close
para.existing_party: It's already an existing party name
para.stop_editing:
The content written so far is not saved.
Would you like to stop editing?
para.close_party:
Are you sure you want to close the current party room?
All data will not be saved.
para.no_longer_see_chat: You will no longer see the user's chat in this room (applies to me only)
para.leave_party_confirm:
Your changes won't be saved.
Are you sure you want to leave the party room?

title.time_limit: DJing time limit per session: $1 minutes

para.no_dj_crew:
No one is djing now.
Why not become the DJ and make some noise!
para.create_playlist_song: Before you join the queue, please create a playlist with at least one song.
para.cancel_dj_queue_confirm: Do you want to remove yourself from the DJ queue?
para.lock_dj_queue: Do you want to lock the queue? No new DJs will be added.
para.skip_dj_song: Do you want to skip the current song?
para.write_reason: Please provide a reason (at least 2 characters)
para.deleted_queue_by_admin: You have been removed from the queue by the administrator
para.locked_queue_by_admin: The current DJ queue is locked by an admin
para.skipped_song_by_admin: According to the admin policy, songs longer than $1 minutes will be automatically skipped
para.dj_in_order: DJing one person at a time from the waiting list, in order
para.played_sequentially: Songs from the top of the playlist are played sequentially, one song per person
para.empty_dj: zZz...No Djing in currently in progress...

para.edit_only_admin: Only Community Manager and above can make edit action
para.noti_deleted: When you add a new announcement, the old one will be removed!

para.enter_playlist_name: Please provide a name for your playlist
para.delete_playlist_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item from the list?
para.delete_duplicated_list_confirm:
'$1' already has this song!
Should we remove the duplicate and add it again?
para.no_list_yet: There's no list yet! Try to fill it with your favorite songs.
para.up_to_10_if_connect_wallet: If you connect your wallet, you can create up to 10!

ec.exceeded_list_connect_wallet: You have already exceeded the number of lists that can be created.
ec.exceeded_list: Oh no! You have exceeded the number of lists that can be created. You can only create up to 10.
ec.up_to_100_songs: You can add a maximum of 100 songs to each playlist
